description: Someone broke into my car and stole my laptop and phone. The incident happened around 3 PM when I was shopping at the mall.

location.address: 123 Main Street, Downtown Mall Parking Lot
location.details: Level 2, Section B, near the food court entrance

suspects.description: Male, approximately 5'8 inches, wearing dark hoodie and jeans, around 25-30 years old
suspects.vehicle: White sedan, could not see license plate clearly

witnesses.info: Mall security guard saw someone suspicious near the parking area around 3:15 PM. Security office has contact details.
